bibl.title: Between Egypt and Meroitic Nubia. The Southern Frontier Region.
bibl.note: Introduction: The natural, ethnic, and symbolic frontier. - The settlements. - The Roman conquest of lower Nubia. - The frontier garrison. - Admninistration. - Creating a sacred landscape. - The arbiters of the Meroitic reoccupation of the Dodekaschoinos. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Török László, Between Egypt and Meroitic Nubia. The Southern Frontier Region.
Christina Riggs (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt (Oxford, 2012) pp. 749-762, 3 figg.

Introduction: The natural, ethnic, and symbolic frontier. - The settlements. - The Roman conquest of lower Nubia. - The frontier garrison. - Admninistration. - Creating a sacred landscape. - The arbiters of the Meroitic reoccupation of the Dodekaschoinos. - Conclusion.
